# irxforge

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/InsightRX/irxforge/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/InsightRX/irxforge/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
  <!-- badges: end -->

`irxforge` is an R package for generating, parsing, and converting datasets in pharmacometrics.

## Installation

Install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/InsightRX/irxforge) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("InsightRX/irxforge")
```

## Documentation

See at [`https://insightrx.github.io/irxforge/`](https://insightrx.github.io/irxforge/reference/index.html) and also in the installed package: `help(package = "irxforge")`.
